Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    rajawali.BaseObject3D.getLight()
    use getLight(int index) instead
    rajawali.util.LittleEndianDataInputStream.readLine()
    rajawali.BaseObject3D.setLight(ALight)
    Use addLight() instead
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    rajawali.animation.RotateAnimation3D(Number3D)
    use RotateAnimation3D(axis, degreesToRotate) or RotateAnimation(axis, rotateFrom, degreesToRotate)
    rajawali.animation.RotateAnimation3D(Number3D, Number3D)
    use RotateAnimation3D(axis, degreesToRotate) or RotateAnimation(axis, rotateFrom, degreesToRotate)
